Articles.Content:
Thanks for the feed back, any ideas for a more challenging planet?

Just made a planet with atmosphere so thick reaction wheels don't work, still fiddling with atmosphere.
A mountainous terrain with oceans of some type of fluid. Throw in an odd atmosphere and it would be incredibly challenging. Even without the atmosphere it would be a challenge. I like it already!
still figuring oceans out.
What about a planet with only one small plateau that can be landed on...
sounds interesting

Current little project, Moon for fearless.

Peabody
Now that's a cool looking moon!
did some more messing with it
How big is it?

radius 58km

soi about 1500km

ASL is .07

subject to change
Redoing the textures for Fearless from scratch.

Just an additional note about peabody.

The pits are about 15-18km deep

Trying to land in one of those pits would be a very interesting venture!

I like the new look of Fearless much better.
kind of looks like it's made out of bacon....
Are you going to release the new version soon?
Yes, just working on tweaking Fearless, want to add in an extra moon

Fearless looks like muscle tissue. I should make a syringe shaped impactor and give the planet vaccinations.

Edit: It's [EXPLETIVE REDACTED] creepy.
Oh definitely creepy
Can't wait to try landing in one of those 15-18km deep pits. AS soon as you release the new version I'm doing a ship modification and going for it. I will post some of the pics.
Updated and released, look forward to seeing the pics, also here's the extra moon
Nice! Just downloaded. I'm going to create the Peabody Explorer right now and head for Fearless first thing in the morning. I hope by tomorrow late morning or early afternoon to be posting pictures.
just remember, no atmosphere on fearless

I couldn't wait, I'm now orbiting Fearless between the two moons.

I need to go back to version 4 to use my two rovers on Boris and Natasha.
Going to be experimenting with a bit of texture reductions to reduce memory impact for users using multiple star systems
I have multiple KSP game folders installed and on some larger multiple star systems I set the texture resolution to half. That works for me.
